name: Osphardal and the Isles of Vitality
name_original: Osphardal and the Isles of Vitality
description:
Osphardal and the Isles of Vitality was created for a university assignment and would be a cartoony and campy call back to kaiju movies of old, with Kaiju and humans battling it out for control of the natural energies of the island.

You will need to put 9 crystals into the pool near the starting area (Press E in the collision near the pool) and then 19 to get the dash to destroy the differently coloured wall.

Falling in the ocean water will reset all progress

No tree jumps are required
